Bear Harold;
As Radio Birector of the NAEB Region IV I would like to get out
a memo to radio members in the region to keep them up-to-date on
activities and to make an attempt to draw them a little closer
together. With no funds available for regional meetings I may he
able to start a Region IV newsletter of sorts. I also want to
promote the Washington convention if I can.
With the above in mind can you give me some information re the
followings
Is there any chance that funds for a region IV meeting might be
available?
Will the Madison Seminar Report be sent to all members? If so,when ?
Will the report be discussed at the Washington convention and if so
will members have an opportunity to go over it before convention time?
Will members have an opportunity to read the report and give me their
comments in time to pass them on at the next board meeting?
If it is decided that a Region IV meeting is desirable at the Washington
convention, when would be the best time to hold it?
Bo you have any words of wisdom that I might pass on to Region IV
members?
Thanks for any info you can supply.
Sincerely,
y Carl H. Menzer
^ Birector
